summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3787 for the improvement of Interlake Avenue and Ashworth Avenue, each from North 40th Street to North 41st Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with the necessary appurtenances under Ordinance No. 46673, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
